tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE international_property_sales (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id UUID NOT NULL,
    buyer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    seller_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    sale_price DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL,
    sale_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE InternationalPropertySales (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id UUID NOT NULL,
    buyer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    seller_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(12,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PropertyDetails (
    property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_address TEXT NOT NULL,
    property_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    property_size DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    property_value DECIMAL(12,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE international_property_sales_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    buyer_name VARCHAR(50),
    seller_name VARCHAR(50),
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    currency VARCHAR(3)
);

CREATE TABLE property_details (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_address VARCHAR(100),
    property_type VARCHAR(50),
    property_size_sqft INT,
    property_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    action_date TIMESTAMP,
    performed_by VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE international_property_sales (
	property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	property_name VARCHAR(255),
	property_location VARCHAR(255),
	seller_name VARCHAR(255),
	buyer_name VARCHAR(255),
	transaction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE property_images (
	image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	property_id INT,
	image_url VARCHAR(255),
	FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES international_property_sales(property_id)
)

CREATE TABLE property_transactions (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	property_id INT,
	transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
	FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES international_property_sales(property_id)
)

CREATE TABLE property_agents (
	agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	agent_name VARCHAR(255),
	contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE International_Property_Sales (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT NOT NULL,
    buyer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    seller_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Property_Details (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    property_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    property_size INT NOT NULL,
    property_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Transaction_History (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT NOT NULL,
    buyer_id INT NOT NULL,
    seller_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL
);
